main.name: Agustin Vazquez
main.description: My personal goal is to improve the way of living of people by creating innovative mobile products
main.bio: I started mobile development back on 2011, when only a native approach (Java / Obj-C) was possible for building mobile apps. On 2018 I discovered React Native and continued working until today. During my career, I have also worked with databases, AWS, APIs and small websites (this site is hosted in AWS using a cloudfront and static website in S3). In my free time I like playing soccer and videogames with friends and also cooking.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: My focus is primarily on mobile, but also have skills in other areas.

work.title: React Native Developer
work.description: As a react native developer, my job is to build mobile products. Most of them required bridging native code with react native. Check my resume for more information.

work.title: Mobile Developer
work.description: Built a prototype for a startup based in the Netherlands using React Native, and by using AI and OpenGL it could detect health emergencies.

work.title: Founder / Technology Director
work.description: Started my own software development company based in Buenos Aires. Worked on countless of projects using Android, iOS, React Native, Spring Framework, IOT, etc. Just can't describe 6 years working here in a few lines. Please check my resume for more info.

work.title: Java Android / IOs Developer
work.description: Developed a mobile game that detected phone shakes, GPS, compass, accelerometers, camera (QR bars) and bluetooth.

work.title: Java Android Developer
work.description: Created my first and own mobile product (App + API) that showed the roadblocks of my city, similar to Waze—ultimately reaching over 50,000 users. Unfortunately, when Waze arrived in Buenos Aires my project lost almost all of their users.

projects.title: Scholly Search
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Scholly Math
projects.category: Scholly Math is an AI-powered math solver that instantly interprets and solves any type of math problem, from basic arithmetic to complex calculus proofs.

projects.title: Toyboy Warehouse
projects.category: Toyboy Warehouse is the UK’s largest cougar dating app for older women and younger men.

projects.title: We Cover
projects.category: Secures your goods such as your bicycle, phone, or car via We Cover.

projects.title: Fairmarket Home
projects.category: Fairmarket is a revolutionary platform for homeowners and contractors. However, it is not just a platform - it is a powerful full-range, deeply personalized home improvement, and management app, the first of its kind.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
